message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I was hoping to negotiate a better price. Considering the product's value to you is $800000, I'm willing to pay $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll receive from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $850000. Considering the product's value to you is $1000000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering a counteroffer of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you'll receive from the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget.
